attributes.action: Create a seperate bank holiday for VE day 2020
attributes.additional_details:
Although lordable there are two problems with doing this. 

Firstly, insufficient thought has been placed into the effects of moving the b/h for those within society who have made plans and arrangements far in advance relying on the predictable nature of the May b/h.

Secondly this historic event should be marked in it's own right with it's own dedicated b/h.
attributes.background: The government has stated that it intends to move the early May bank holiday from the traditional Monday to the Friday to coincide with the 75th anniversary of VE day.
